knimeNode.name: Write PNG Image
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a PNG image object to a png file.

fullDescription.intro: Writes a PNG image object to a png file. The image input object must contain a valid png image as otherwise the node will fail during executing.
fullDescription.option: Specify the output file. The target folder must already exist.
Select this to allow the node to overwrite any existing file. If unselected and the file exists, the node will fail during execution.
